forumNotes.author: steve6375
forumNotes.content: Most card readers are seen as USB Storage devices. I can boot from card slots on notebooks fine. The USB card readers you link to will look like a USB pen drive and you can also boot to these too. I have several and these just look like a USB pen to the BIOS.
